title: Week Pulse — Dallas stays hot, Berlin survives
summary: Dallas is surging at the right time, Berlin keeps escaping late, and Saint Catherine is slipping.
body: Dallas is surging at the right time and looks like the team nobody wants to face.
Berlin keeps surviving late — it’s working, but the margin is getting thinner each week.
Saint Catherine’s season is slipping away and the pressure is rising fast.

title: Power Rankings Update — top 3 reshuffle
summary: A surprise result shakes up the top of the league. Fans are already debating the order.
body: This week’s results forced a reshuffle at the top of the league.
Some teams are climbing on momentum, while others are holding on by a thread.
Hit Fan Activity to vote and debate who belongs in the top spots.

title: Fraud Watch is live — vote and share
summary: Which team is getting too much hype? Drop your vote and see what the league thinks.
body: Vote for the team you think is the most overrated right now.
Then share your pick and see where the league lands.
